Name: Pisco Sour (blended)
Ingredients: 6 barspoon Powdered sugar (white sugar ground in mortar and pestle)
60 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: BLEND lime and sugar to dissolve sugar. Add pisco, egg white and 6oz scoop crushed ice and BLEND again. Serve with paper straws.
Review: This blended version of a Pisco Sour is the authentic Peruvian and indeed Chilean serve.
